title: BONUS EPISODE: Bobby Shmurda Brings The ENERGY + Talks Music Politics, Life Changes & Business Aspirations
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Bobby Shmurda sits down with Ebro in the Morning and brought all the energy and fun as they discuss how life has changed after prison, politics in the music business, changes he has made in his life, business aspirations in his life, and more! #EbrointheMorning #HOT97 #BobbyShmurda

Subscribe to "Summer Jam: Through The Years" - hosted by Laura Stylez!

iTunes: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/summer-jam-through-the-years/id1627066431 

Amazon: https://music.amazon.com/podcasts/6dfef9f3-4ff5-4d05-a857-6689c99aa999/summer-jam-through-the-years

Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/7MP62llakMJSXkJzwFclgq

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
